price: Diejenigen aber, die glauben und rechtschaffene Werke tun, leitet ihr Herr wegen ihres Glaubens recht. Unter ihnen werden Flüsse strömen in den Gärten der Wonne.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَعَمِلُواْ ٱلصَّٰلِحَٰتِ يَهۡدِيهِمۡ رَبُّهُم بِإِيمَٰنِهِمۡۖ تَجۡرِي مِن تَحۡتِهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۡهَٰرُ فِي جَنَّٰتِ ٱلنَّعِيمِ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū waʿamilū al-ṣāliḥāti yahdīhim rabbuhum biīmānihim tajrī min taḥtihimu al-anhāru fī jannāti al-naʿīmi
